reviewText: Our son loves this dvd to no end, and I can't blame him! The songs are a lot of fun and well-written, and the video presentation is very creatively done. All in all, this dvd feels very "genuine"; it captures the spirit of being a kid and having fun, and doesn't feel overprocessed as if the goal is to sell you a product. I would trade all our other children's dvds in for just this one (well, except our other Hoy Lari Live in Concert dvd...).
